item.description:
I've tried booking a Sunday evening at Blue Ginger for the group a couple of times without success. (Sunday evening because it's a bit of a drive, and Fridays/Saturdays are too busy.) So this is an impromptu spur of the moment thing.

In case you don't know Blue Ginger, it has been at times one of the most interesting restaurants in the area, serving up "fusion" food before that was well known. The fusion is with Asia. It is pricey, but yet a good value on the exponential price curve.

http://www.ming.com/b...
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the hostess for the Meetup group
item.name: Blue Ginger
